statements: UPDATE InventoryTracking SET quantity=20, location='Warehouse A' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE InventoryTracking SET product_name='New Product', quantity=10 WHERE barcode_value='12345';
UPDATE InventoryTracking SET quantity = 100, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InventoryTracking SET barcode_value = '1234567890', rfid_tag = 'RFID1234', quantity = 50 WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE InventoryMovement SET from_location = 'Warehouse' WHERE movement_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9123-456789123456'
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, location = 'Warehouse' WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InventoryMovement SET from_location = 'Shelf A', to_location = 'Shelf B' WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE shipments SET arrival_date = '2022-12-15' WHERE shipment_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = 50, item_name = 'Updated Item' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE item_movements SET location = 'Warehouse C', status = 'In Transit' WHERE movement_id = 3;
UPDATE barcode_scanners SET manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET quantity = 50, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';
UPDATE barcode_scanners SET manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.', scanner_type = 'Handheld' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE rfid_technology SET frequency = 'High Frequency', rfid_type = 'Passive' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE products SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE movements SET quantity = 20 WHERE warehouse_id = 3 AND product_id = 6;
UPDATE products SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE warehouses SET manager = 'John Doe', capacity = capacity - 10 WHERE id = 98765;
